sense.gloss: activity (esp. energetic or successful), great efforts, active participation
walking about with great vigor
leap, jump
stepping out into the wider world, becoming active on a wider stage, playing an active part (in)
rapid progress, dramatic development, making great strides, making a leap forward
leap (of logic), jump, gap (in an argument)
making rapid progress, making great advances, rush, dash, onslaught
suddenly (rising to fame, etc.), instantly, immediately, overnight
one bound, one leap
lively motion, throb
desperate, frantic, excited, worked up, heated, eager
secret manoeuvres (maneuvers), operating behind the scenes
jump, leap, skip, bound
to jump up, to spring up, to leap
to move around, to bounce up and down
to pound (of one's heart, e.g. with excitement), to throb
to be messy (of handwriting), to be untidy
vivid, lifelike, graphic
dancing or jumping for joy
leaping, jumping, spring, exciting
jump up for joy
leaping for joy, exultation
tremendous, rapid, dramatic
to spring at, to leap upon
to jump into, to rush into
to spring up, to leap to one's feet, to jump up and down
taking heart, being in high spirits
iteration mark (used to represent repetition of the previous character), ditto mark
to dance
leaping with joy, jumping about
behind-the-scenes maneuvering, behind-the-scenes manoeuvering, secret maneuvers, secret manoeuvres
relaxation oscillation
to leap out (e.g. onto the stage), to spring out
to jump (e.g. into first place), to shoot (e.g. to the top), to come to the forefront, to suddenly become prominent
demonstrative of one's worth, worthy of one's reputation, living up to one's name, characteristically masterful
bolstering one's reputation, enhancing one's prestige, winning one honour, doing one credit
Great Leap Forward (failed attempt to industrialize China and increase agricultural production; 1958-1960)
significant breakthrough, great strides
to be excited, to be elated
heart-pounding, exciting, thrilling, heartrending
to have one's heart pound, to be thrilled
to be thrilled, to be excited
to get excited, to make one's heart leap, to make one's heart pound
jerk, surge, lurch, derivative of acceleration with respect to time
skip distance
word consisting of (two) repeated syllables
being very active, being very useful, playing a very active part, making a spectacular showing, great efforts, splendid work
jumping power
jumping event (track and field)
all of creation following their original natures, living and enjoying themselves freely, the kites fly and the fish leap
Heaven's will that all of creation shall follow their original natures and live freely
as a ruler's benevolence spreads, the people will find their places in the land based on their abilities
time travel, leaping through time
to tingle with excitement, to be full of excitement, to be thrilled
to throw oneself, to jump, to leap
to throw (oneself), to hurl, to cast, to fling
to stir (one's feelings), to get excited, to make (one's heart) pound, to make (one's heart) leap

to stir (one's feelings), to get excited, to make (one's heart) pound, to make (one's heart) leap
to get excited
energetic feeling, sense of liveliness, vigor

sdata.j: ↑企業↑↓きぎょう↓↑社会↑↓しゃかい↓が↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓らの↑活躍↑↓かつやく↓の↑場↑↓ば↓をどう↑用意↑↓ようい↓できるか、も↑大↑↓おお↓きな↑課題↑↓かだい↓だが、↑一方↑↓いっぽう↓でこれからの↑日本↑↓にっぽん↓↑社会↑↓しゃかい↓が↑必要↑↓ひつよう↓とする↑創造↑↓そうぞう↓↑性↑↓せい↓↑豊↑↓ゆた↓かな↑人材↑↓じんざい↓を、↑教育↑↓きょういく↓↑産業↑↓さんぎょう↓がどう↑育成↑↓いくせい↓し、↑提供↑↓ていきょう↓していけるかも↑重要↑↓じゅうよう↓だ。
sdata.e: One problem is how the enterprises arrange posts for excellent female students, but another important point is whether the educational industry can grow and supply creative students needed for Japan's future.

sdata.j: ↑会社↑↓かいしゃ↓の↑利益↑↓りえき↓は↑飛躍↑↓ひやく↓↑的↑↓てき↓に↑増加↑↓ぞうか↓した。
sdata.e: The company's profits soared.

sdata.j: ↑会社↑↓かいしゃ↓の↑収益↑↓しゅうえき↓は↑飛躍↑↓ひやく↓↑的↑↓てき↓に↑増加↑↓ぞうか↓した。
sdata.e: The company's profits soared.

sdata.j: ↑医師↑↓いし↓↑達↑↓たち↓は↑癌↑↓がん↓との↑戦↑↓たたか↓いで↑大↑↓だい↓↑躍進↑↓やくしん↓を↑遂↑↓と↓げた。
sdata.e: Doctors have made great strides in their fight against cancer.

sdata.j: ロンドンの↑警察↑↓けいさつ↓はいつも↑電車↑↓でんしゃ↓や↑地下鉄↑↓ちかてつ↓の↑爆弾↑↓ばくだん↓を↑探↑↓さが↓し↑出↑↓だ↓すのに↑躍起↑↓やっき↓となっている。
sdata.e: In London, the police are always worried about finding a bomb on the train or subway.

sdata.j: また、お↑説教↑↓せっきょう↓が↑始↑↓はじ↓まった。↑一言居士↑↓いちげんこじ↓の↑面目↑↓めんぼく↓↑躍如↑↓やくじょ↓というところだね。
sdata.e: Uh-oh, here comes another lecture. How typical. This guy has something to say about everything.

sdata.j: ますます↑多↑↓おお↓くの↑人↑↓ひと↓が、その↑媒体↑↓ばいたい↓の↑双方向↑↓そうほうこう↓↑的↑↓てき↓な↑性質↑↓せいしつ↓を↑利用↑↓りよう↓しようと↑躍起↑↓やっき↓になっている。
sdata.e: More and more people are rushing to make use of the interactive nature of the medium.

sdata.j: ↑警察↑↓けいさつ↓は↑群衆↑↓ぐんしゅう↓を↑制止↑↓せいし↓するのに↑躍起↑↓やっき↓になっている。
sdata.e: The police are going all out just to hold back the crowd.

sdata.j: ↑警察↑↓けいさつ↓は↑暴走↑↓ぼうそう↓↑族↑↓ぞく↓を↑躍起↑↓やっき↓になって↑鎮圧↑↓ちんあつ↓しようとしている。
sdata.e: The police are going all out to keep down the rioting bikers.

sdata.j: ↑元気↑↓げんき↓で↑活躍↑↓かつやく↓していることと↑思↑↓おも↓います。
sdata.e: I hope things have been going well for you.

sdata.j: ↑仕事↑↓しごと↓でご↑活躍↑↓かつやく↓ですね。
sdata.e: I see you're doing very well in your business.

sdata.j: ↑支配人↑↓しはいにん↓の↑背後↑↓はいご↓で↑暗躍↑↓あんやく↓した。
sdata.e: He acted behind the manager's back.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑今↑↓いま↓まさに↑最後↑↓さいご↓の↑旅路↑↓たびじ↓につき、↑暗黒↑↓あんこく↓へと↑一大↑↓いちだい↓↑飛躍↑↓ひやく↓しようとしている。
sdata.e: I am about to take my last voyage, a great leap in the dark.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓↑達↑↓たち↓は↑幸運↑↓こううん↓に↑小躍↑↓こおど↓りして↑喜↑↓よろこ↓んだ。
sdata.e: We exulted at our good fortune.

sdata.j: ↑少女↑↓しょうじょ↓はうれしさのあまり↑小躍↑↓こおど↓りした。
sdata.e: The girl danced for joy.

sdata.j: ↑乗組↑↓のりくみ↓↑員↑↓いん↓たちは↑小躍↑↓こおど↓りして↑喜↑↓よろこ↓んだ。
sdata.e: The crew jumped for joy.

sdata.j: ↑新↑↓あたら↓しい↑地位↑↓ちい↓でご↑活躍↑↓かつやく↓することを↑確信↑↓かくしん↓しています。
sdata.e: I am sure you will take an active role in your new position.

sdata.j: ↑世界↑↓せかい↓の↑旅客機↑↓りょかくき↓の↑半数↑↓はんすう↓↑以上↑↓いじょう↓を↑製造↑↓せいぞう↓しているボーイング↑社↑↓しゃ↓は、もっともなことだが、↑機体↑↓きたい↓の↑他↑↓ほか↓に↑欠陥↑↓けっかん↓を↑起↑↓お↓こす↑可能↑↓かのう↓↑性↑↓せい↓のあるものに、↑注意↑↓ちゅうい↓を↑引↑↓ひ↓こうと↑躍起↑↓やっき↓になっている。
sdata.e: Boeing, which builds more than half the world's commercial airliners, is understandably keen to draw attention to what can go wrong besides planes.

sdata.j: ↑政府↑↓せいふ↓はインフレを↑押↑↓おさ↓え↑込↑↓こ↓もうと↑躍起↑↓やっき↓になっている。
sdata.e: The government is desperate to keep inflation down.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑言↑↓い↓うことには↑理論↑↓りろん↓の↑飛躍↑↓ひやく↓がありすぎる。
sdata.e: There is a leap of logic in what he says.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は７０↑歳↑↓さい↓でなお↑活躍↑↓かつやく↓している。
sdata.e: At seventy, he is still active.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓はうれしさのあまり↑小躍↑↓こおど↓りした。
sdata.e: He was so happy he did a little dance.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑政界↑↓せいかい↓で↑活躍↑↓かつやく↓している。
sdata.e: He is playing an active part in politics.

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓の↑胸↑↓むね↓は↑喜↑↓よろこ↓びに↑躍↑↓おど↓った。
sdata.e: Her heart jumped for joy.

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑一躍↑↓いちやく↓↑有名↑↓ゆうめい↓になった。
sdata.e: She suddenly became famous.

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑喜↑↓よろこ↓んで↑小躍↑↓こおど↓りをした。
sdata.e: She danced with joy.

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑今↑↓いま↓も↑第一線↑↓だいいっせん↓で↑活躍↑↓かつやく↓している。
sdata.e: She's still active in the front lines.

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑婦人↑↓ふじん↓↑解放↑↓かいほう↓↑運動↑↓うんどう↓で↑積極↑↓せっきょく↓↑的↑↓てき↓に↑活躍↑↓かつやく↓した。
sdata.e: She took an active part in the women's lib movement.

sdata.j: ↑僕↑↓ぼく↓の↑姉↑↓あね↓が↑大↑↓だい↓↑躍進↑↓やくしん↓だよ。
sdata.e: My sister hit the jackpot!

sdata.j: いったん↑着地↑↓ちゃくち↓した↑怪物↑↓かいぶつ↓は、↑瞬間↑↓しゅんかん↓ふたたび↑跳躍↑↓ちょうやく↓して↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑頭上↑↓ずじょう↓にいた。
sdata.e: Having once landed the monster immediately jumped again and was over my head.
